content:
I just wanted to thank you guys for the wonderful job we've done in the past two weeks.
I had an amazing time working on this project and already learned a few new things: setting up [Github] CI, trying out Conventional Commits, (a little bit of) benchmarking and profiling in Rust, and can also pick up property testing from your excellent examples.

And that's all at a comfortable pace, while having thoughtful conversations and just having fun in general.
I hope it was the same for you and that it continues being such a wonderful experience :smile:
The feeling is mutual! I couldn't have hoped for so much when starting this project!
I feel like I have been stealing all the fun jobs. So it is a massive relief to know that you are both enjoying it as well.
